profile.name: Ilker Ozturk
profile.role: Student at Humber College & Fullstack Developer
profile.summary: Skilled website and app developer with a keen eye for detail and a strong passion for coding, open to collabs for any projects :)

experience.title: Controller Technician Assistant
details: Install and configure Honeywell-based controllers and compatible sensors, ensuring optimal functionality and integration with existing systems.
Perform regular maintenance and troubleshooting of control systems to ensure smooth operation and prevent potential issues.
Conduct thorough testing and quality checks on installed devices to verify performance and compliance with industry standards.

experience.title: Database Developer (Internship)
details: Assisted in the design, development, and optimization of SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to support various applications and reporting needs.
Identified and resolved database-related issues, ensuring smooth and uninterrupted database operations.
Participated in the design and implementation of database schemas, tables, and relationships, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval.

experience.title: Assistant Electrician
details: Assisted in installing electrical systems in residential, commercial, and industrial buildings, ensuring compliance with safety codes and regulations.
Helped with the layout and installation of electrical wiring, circuits, and outlets, ensuring efficient and safe connections.

experience.title: Assistant Waiter
details: Prepared dining areas by setting tables, arranging table settings, and ensuring cleanliness and orderliness.
Worked closely with the restaurant team to ensure efficient and smooth service operations during peak hours.

experience.title: Crew Member
details: Performed routine cleaning tasks, including sanitizing workstations, washing dishes, and maintaining overall restaurant hygiene.
Delivered orders to customers in a timely manner, ensuring accuracy and satisfaction.

projects.name: Task Manager App
projects.description: A simple Electron-based task manager application with a custom menu bar, modal dialogs, and task management features. Built with Electron, it offers task creation, priority setting, and due date management.

projects.name: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: The Weather Forecast App is a React-based application designed to provide weather forecasts for cities. It leverages the Open-Meteo API for weather data and the Geocode Maps API for converting city names into geographic coordinates.
